title: France investigating Vinted over alleged links to pornographic content
description: Some sellers were found to be luring viewers to their personal pages on adult platforms such as OnlyFans.
content:
Second-hand clothing platform Vinted is under investigation in France after some user accounts were found to be directing visitors topornographic content.

title: Oumar Traore wanted by police over fatal Handsworth stabbing
description: Police have named a 17-year-old wanted in connection with the death of Yassin Alama.
content:
Detectives investigating the murder of a man in Birmingham have named a 17-year-old boy they want to question.
Several attempts have been made by West Midlands Police to arrest Oumar Traore since the stabbing of 19-year-old Yassin Alama in Handsworth... [332 chars]

title: Birmingham bin strikes to continue for months, union warns, as industrial dispute deepens
description: Workers have been locked in a standoff with the city council for most of the year.
content:
Rubbish will continue rotting in the streets of Birmingham for months, union chiefs have warned, after more workers voted to join industrial action.

title: Poland rail explosion: PM says blast was 'unprecedented act of sabotage'
description: Authorities say the blast happened on a line leading to the border with Ukraine.
content:
Poland's prime minister has said an explosion on a railway line leading to the Ukraine border this weekend was caused by "an unprecedented act of sabotage", and vowed to catch those responsible "regardless of who their backers are".

title: Ukraine to get 100 French-made Rafale F4 fighter jets in 'historic' deal
description: President Volodymyr Zelensky hails a "historic" deal aimed at boosting Ukraine's defences against deadly Russian air attacks.
content:
Ukraine will get up to 100 of France's Rafale F4 fighter jets as well as advanced air defence systems in a major deal to boost Kyiv's ability to protect itself against deadly Russian attacks.
